name: Mirror Mirror (Hollowed_Bats, Stunningham)
description: Mirror Mirror is a puzzle platformer where you play as a hamster going through a series of experiments. Your surroundings aren't always accurate to reality, so you'll need to look within the mirror to see the world as it truly is.  You'll have to make your way through 15 experiments by grabbing keys, pushing blocks, and sprinting through tubes to find your way to the doorway where the next experiment awaits.
